item.title: What Every Aaronic Priesthood Holder Needs to Understand
item.description:
What Every Aaronic Priesthood Holder Needs to Understand by undefined Douglas D. Holmes, First Counselor in the Young Men General Presidency given in Saturday Evening of 188th Annual General Conference on Sat Mar 31 2018
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: undefined Douglas D. Holmes, First Counselor in the Young Men General Presidency

item.title: Deep in Our Heart
item.description:
